thread.title: South Korean Tennis Phenom Is the Surprise of the Australian Open

author: Tom Perrotta
title: South Korean Tennis Phenom Is the Surprise of the Australian Open
text:
As South Korea prepares to host the Winter Olympics in a few weeks, the country has received a boost that no one there was expecting: the astounding tennis of young phenom Hyeon Chung.
Chung, 21, has reached the semifinals of the Australian Open and will play Roger Federer, one of the sportâ€™s living legends, on Friday evening in Melbourne. Chung came this far by beating Novak Djokovic, once the most dominant player in the game who is suffering from an injured elbow. Chung also beat Alexander Zverev, the 20-year-old who is...
